snippet: Lacking the support of lawmakers to increase the minimum wage to that level , Mayor Bill de Blasio, addressing the Association for a Better New York, urged employers to increase pay voluntarily.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio asks business leaders to raise their minimum wages to $13 per hour voluntarily during speech to civic group Assn for a Better New York.
lead_paragraph: Lacking the support of lawmakers to increase the minimum wage to that level , Mayor Bill de Blasio, addressing the Association for a Better New York, urged employers to increase pay voluntarily.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Urges New York Businesses to Raise Hourly Wages to Over $13
headline.print_headline: Mayor Urges Business Leaders to Raise Wages to More Than $13 an Hour

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Assn for a Better New York
